item.title: Sen. Jim Justice, wife to pay $5 million in back taxes to settle IRS suit

item.title: As judges face more threats, only the Supreme Court got new security funds
item.description: Judiciary officials had asked lawmakers for an additional $142 million for security for lower federal courts, a 19 percent increase.

item.title: After a week of censures, some in Congress are having second thoughts
item.description: Censures were historically rare rebukes against lawmakers. But members of the House are increasingly using them in ways their peers say are political.
